descriptionHtml:
This plug-in adds a new playable house near Darkwater Crossing.
The house includes a living room, a bedroom with fully operating bookshelves and weapons displayers, an alchemy/enchanting lab, a basement and a secret treasure room accessible via a false cabinet in the living room.
Into the basement there is also a secret door that leads to the Stillwater Abyss.
This is a system of two very deep caves linked by an underwater tunnel. In the first one there is a camp-site for underground studies. The second cave is the perfect habitat for a Nirnroot plantation.

Note that the house is fully Navmeshed and all containers are safe and non-respawning.
This project is a work-in-progress, so further optimizations and modifications will be added constantly.

For all your questions you can e-mail me at: Dark_Angel__90@hotmail.it
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1

    Weapon Plaques fixed: now they display your weapons correctly.
    Added a Map Marker for Stillwater Refuge enabling Fast Travel to this location.
author: Fabrizio D

files.name: Stillwater Refuge
files.changelogHtml:
Weapon Plaques fixed: now they display your weapons correctly.
Added a Map Marker for Stillwater Refuge enabling Fast Travel to this location.
